const QString &  outputFilePath = QString() 
) [virtual]

Add new processing item to hotfolder's state model.

If the output file name is not set, the file name will be calculated automatically.

virtual bool ihotf::CHotfolderProcessingInfo::ItemExists ( const QString &  inputFilePath,
ihotf::IHotfolderProcessingItem **  foundItemPtr = NULL 
) const [virtual]

Return true if the item for the given input and output path already exists.

If foundItemPtr not equals NULL and an item was found, foundItemPtr will be set to the found item.
